## ThemeLoadOptions.signal property

An `AbortSignal` object instance; allows you to communicate with a loading process (including fetch requests) request and abort it if desired via an `AbortController`<!-- -->.

Modeled after Web APIs `fetch`<!-- -->s `init.signal`<!-- -->.

 https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope/fetch  https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/AbortController

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
signal?: AbortSignal;
```
